summary: This is a brief email correspondence from August 27, 2019, regarding the completion of a 'Silent Hit' on Ghislaine Maxwell. The purpose is to notify of any international travel by Maxwell for a one-year period.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a 'Silent Hit' request to monitor for international travel.

events.title: Silent Hit on Maxwell initiated
events.description: A 'Silent Hit' was completed and activated for Ghislaine Maxwell to notify of any international travel, effective from 5 PM on August 27, 2019, through August 27, 2020.

keyFacts: A 'Silent Hit' was placed on Ghislaine Maxwell on August 27, 2019.
The surveillance was active for one year, from August 27, 2019, to August 27, 2020.
The specific purpose was to receive notification of any international travel by Maxwell.
